title: PHPord()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPord()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Return the ASCII value of "h": "; echo ord("hello")."
"; ?> Definition and Usage The ord() function returns the ASCII value of the first character of a string. Syntax ord( string ) Parameter Values Parameter Description string Required. The string to get an ASCII value from Technical Details Return Value: Returns the ASCII value as an integer PHP Version: 4+ ★ +1
